overview_of_class: Complex numbers, analytic functions, contour integrals, Cauchy's theorem, Laurent series, residue theorem, conformal mapping, analytic continuation. Students may not receive credit for both 325 and ESAM 311-3. Prerequisites: 234 and 240 or equivalent.
name: Complex Analysis
title: WCAS MATH 325-0-51 Complex Analysis

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Complex numbers, analytic functions, contour integrals, Cauchy's theorem, Laurent series, residue theorem, conformal mapping, analytic continuation. Students may not receive credit for both 325 and ESAM 311-3. Prerequisites: 234 and 240 or equivalent.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Grade will be determined by two midterms (15% each),four quizzes (20%), a take-home exam (15 points) and the final (35%). Quizzes and at least one midterm will take place during the discussion period. Attendance at the discussion section is mandatory for this course

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:

Brown and Churchill
McGraw Hill
ISBN: 978-0073383170

descriptions.value: Students may not receive credit for both 325 and ESAM 311-3.
